thread.title: Not enough rehab centres for ice addicts
thread.title_full: Not enough rehab centres for ice addicts

title: Not enough rehab centres for ice addicts
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Not enough rehab centres for ice addicts Not enough rehab centres for ice addicts 42 min ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
No extra money is being spent on drug rehabilitation centres despite a national focus on stopping ice addiction in Australia. The Salvation Army, the largest provider of rehab programs in the country, has waiting lists of up to six months for its residential centres. Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Morning Herald.
